title: Free Skins in Champ Select
body:
http://puu.sh/mzYzm/9e0f79818a.jpg
My friend and I switched champs at 15s before entering game. I dont even own vayne. She doesnt own arcade.

replies.body: Shhhhh.  This was the bug nobody wanted fixed.

Hey sacred wolf - 

Thanks for the report! This issue should be resolved.
Does this make me good enough for the PBE or should I keep finding bugs
Hard to say - it depends on what we're looking for to be tested on the PBE. For example, if we're putting out a new marksman, we'd select marksman mains. The criteria varies.
*slips you $20* Well, just tell them I play everything.
Bro if you don't own Vayne you can't trade with your friend for you to play vayne.

> [{quoted}](name=Astrophel,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=HRxXq1zl,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-18T07:23:05.096+0000)
>
> Bro if you don't own Vayne you can't trade with your friend for you to play vayne.

That's literally the point of this thread on the _**"REPORT A BUG"**_  board.
Nah, Vayne's F2P rn. I don't own her, but she I still got a skin for her.

> [{quoted}](name=Astrophel,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=HRxXq1zl,comment-id=0000000000010000,timestamp=2016-01-18T07:46:02.700+0000)
>
> Skin boost perhaps.

It's a glitch in the new champ select.
This happened to me twice a few days ago. Got to play Jade Dragon Wukong and Galactic Nasus and I don't own those skins.
I've had this bug as well when i traded Lucian for Rammus I owned a skin on Lucian and it gave me chrome Rammus for that game only.

> [{quoted}](name=sacred wolf,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=HRxXq1zl,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-01-18T06:44:48.586+0000)
>
> http://puu.sh/mzYzm/9e0f79818a.jpg
> My friend and I switched champs at 15s before entering game. I dont even own vayne. She doesnt own arcade.

This happened to me with Mundo.

Also this is important, it is bugged the other way around as well. My friend and I picked for each other so I would not be countered, he picked Darius for me and I picked Nautilus for him. I only have a Darius skin and he only has a Nautilus skin. After we switched and the game started both our skins loaded as base even though we both have our skins selected.

Kind of sad when you paid money for a skin and it forces base on you...

Anyways just wanted to add the flipside to the bug that's not as great as using skins you don't have in game.
its a glitch if u trade u get there selected skin
